name: benthic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
living in or relating to the lowest levels of the sea or other body of water: Most adult shrimp are benthic creatures, living close to the sea floor. The lake's benthic zone is home to most of the freshwater invertebrates on which larger fish feed. Synonym
benthonic
More examplesFewer examplesBenthic stingrays live at the bottom of the sea while pelagic stingrays are more likely to be found in the open ocean. The diversity of benthic invertebrate species increases the abundance of food fish that populates that part of the ocean. The bay is full of worms and other benthic organisms that are an indicator of good water quality and serve as food for the other creatures.
